name: 劉傳銘
objective: 介紹計算機演算法的設計與分析,內容包含了: 函數成長, 遞迴關係, 排序及序列統計, 基礎與進階資料結構, 動態規劃, 貪婪演算法, 搜尋, 圖形與幾何演算法, 字串比對, NP-completeness, 近似演算法, 及平行與分散式演算法.
schedule:
Introduction (1 hrs)
Mathematics for Algorithms (6 hrs)
Data Structures (5 hrs)
Searching (3 hrs)
Divide-and-Conquer (3 hrs)
Sorting and Selection (6 hrs)
Midterm (3 hrs)
Greedy Algorithms (5 hrs)
Dynamic Programming (7 hrs)
Text Searching (5 hrs)
P and NP (7 hrs)
Final Exam (3 hrs)
scorePolicy:
Assignments (40%): 7-9 homework sets.
Midterm (25%)
Final exam (35%)
materials:
Text (required)
* Algorithms, R. Johnsonbaugh and M. Schaefer, Pearson Prentice Hall, 2004.
Supplementary Texts
*Algorithms, Sanjoy Dasgupta, Christos Papadimitriou, Umesh Vazirani, McGraw-Hill, 2008. ISBN:978-007-125975-0.
*The Design and Analysis of Algorithms, 2nd Edition, Anany Levitin, Addison Wesley, 2007. ISBN:0-321-36413-9
*Algorithm Design, Jon Kleinberg and Éva Tardos, Pearson/Addison-Wesley, 2006.
*Introduction to Algorithms, 3nd edition.  T. Cormen, C. Leiserson, R. Rivest, and C. Stein. MIT Press Edition, 2009. (開發)
*Computer Algorithms, 3rd edition. S. Baase and A. V. Gelder. Addison-Wesley, 2000.
*Algorithms in C++, 3rd. R. Sedgewick. Addison-Wesley, 1998.
*Computers and Intractability, M.R. Garey and D.S. Johnson, W.H. Freeman and Company, 1979.
